short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lists number of players currently playing Midair

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Queries the Midair Steam server list every 60 seconds to grab an accurate list of servers and players.

*Badge with total players across all servers
*Display server list with accurate player information
*Display list of pugs
